message: And Pence is more insulted because the racism of so many of trump's disciples is pointed out. It's funny that using their own words is an insult. GRANTED, their words, and they themselves, are pretty awful, but takes some gall to claim using your own beliefs against you is """"insult driven"""".
Why the Surprise??? Obama has made everything about race.!!!!
You're, not Your...lololol
Wonder what the """"black power, white bitch"""" statement was all about? And why was he rubbing his car like that? He would probably benefit from a mental evaluation.
Well ur another poor lost soul God bless u child as you have lost ur way. Trump 2016

""""The only excuse for the Aristocracy is that it must lead."""" -- Alfred North Whitehead

Do NOT get me started about American Airlines! Two years ago, it took them THREE DAYS and 5 airports to get me from Des Moines to Bogota, Colombia, and ALL they gave me was a $200 travel voucher. I was in the same clothes for THREE days and even slept in the airport. STAY AWAY FROM THIS AIRLINE AT ALL COSTS....I do.
God is great and very amazing! Only he knows his plan for this child. His grace was with her. Thank you Father for thy mercy!

I want to ask the news people the same stupid question they ask others concerning a shooter; """"Didn't you see the red flags???"""" Other people have stated that he had anger issues. I'll answer their stupid question. You don't see any red flags because these people just get angry and go bezerk. You can't control a deceptive nut but you can limit guns. We need laws that restrict who gets to own a gun and how many is a """"need"""" to own.

Ok. Take traffic, move it to the other side of the road then back again. Increase the chances of an accident. It is going to be a disaster. The old system worked fine and the addition of U-turns is great. Just lengthen the signal light times.

I have no problem with that Andre. What I have a problem with is having my tax dollars funding it. She wants a recount, that's fine, then she pays for it. Because the fact of the matter is even by some miracle if Michigan or Wisconsin would change and flip and Pennsylvania does not, nothing changes!! The vote will be different after the recount, but it will be within what is expected for margin of error.

This is highly inappropriate. Karma is a bitch; should this employee end up in that poor elderly man's situation is that how you want to be treated?? To use an act of kidness desperatly needed to lure him in for a nasty, cold hearted prank is too much!!! What's wrong with people these days!!! This employee should lose their job.
